description.value: Resource covering metadata of a study.

definition.value: Language(s) in which a study/substudy is conducted, or a language in which a study document is composed.

comment.value: Short input help: Select all that apply.
Additional information: For each resource, there may be multiple roles, but at least one person, group of persons or institution/organisation must be specified.

definition.value: Indication whether nutritional data was collected by the resource.
Indication whether chronic diseases were addressed by the resource.

comment.value: Additional information: The values originate from the WHO's International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, 11th Revision (ICD-11). | Short input help: Select all that apply. For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO's ICD-11 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the study.

comment.value: Additional information: The values originate from the WHO's International Statistical Classification of Diseases and Related Health Problems, 11th Revision (ICD-11). | Short input help: For more information about the groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO's ICD-11 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify if mortality data were collected in a study.

definition.value: Status of the study approval from the (leading) ethics committee.

comment.value: Additional information: If at least one study site in a multicenter study has the status 'Ongoing', then the overall status for the study must be 'Ongoing'. | Short input help: Select one value from the list.
Short input help: Select one value from the list.
Additional information: The item applies only to studies automatically uploaded from the registers of clinical trials.
Short input help: Select one value from the list.
Short input help: Select all that apply.
Short input help: E.g., indication of the data source(s) not listed in the field „Data sources for the study” or more detailed description of the selected data sources.
Short input help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.
Short input help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion.
Short input help: Any information important for the given study population can be specified here.

definition.value: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant is to be followed, provided in years.

comment.value: Short input help : The value must be provided in years.
Short input help: Select "Yes" or "No" only for drug studies and "Not applicable” for all other studies.

definition.value: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

comment.value: The identifier is assigned automatically.

definition.value: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given resource by another registering systems, e.g. a register of clinical trials or a data repository.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to DRKS.

comment.value: Type = DRKS

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by DRKS.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to NCT (CT.gov).

comment.value: Type = NCT

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by ClinicalTrials.gov.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to ISRCTN.

comment.value: Type = ISRCTN

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by ISRCTN.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to EudraCT.

comment.value: Type = EudraCT

definition.value: Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to EUDAMED.

comment.value: Type = EUDAMED

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by EUDAMED.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to UTN (WHO).

comment.value: Type = UTN

definition.value: Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to KonsortSWD.

comment.value: Type = KonsortSWD

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by KonsortSWD.
Name of the system where the given resource is already registered. Fixed to MDM Portal.

comment.value: Type = MDM Portal

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by MDM Portal.
Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by another registering system, e.g. by a register of clinical trials or a data repository.
Type/name of the system where the given resource is already registered.

comment.value: Type = Other

definition.value: Identifier (ID) assigned to the given resource by another registering system, e.g. by a register of clinical trials or a data repository.
Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the resource.

comment.value: Additional information: If no official title/name has been defined yet, please provide a title/name that is suitable for public display. | Short input help: Please provide at least one title/name of the resource. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

definition.value: Language of the title if it is not the base language of the resource.
Language of the title/name.

comment.value: Translation language of the title

description.value: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

definition.value: Title in another language than the base language of the resource.

comment.value: Translated title

definition.value: Language of the title/name

description.value: This value set includes common codes from BCP-47 (http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47)

comment.value: The item does not exist in NFDI4Health' MDS. Fixed to "active" for all studies.

definition.value: Specification of the main purpose of the study.

comment.value: Additional information: The field is defined foremost for interventional studies. For non-interventional studies, this field may be not appplicable as diverse purposes may be pursued without being able to specify a primary one. In this case, the option "Not applicable" can be selected. | Short input help: Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the study was conducted.

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify the primary purpose of a study in a ResearchStudy resource.

definition.value: If applicable, numerical phase of the study.

comment.value: Short input help: Select one value from the list.

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify the phase of a study in a ResearchStudy resource.

comment.value: Short input help: Select one value from the list.
Short input help: If known, select one value from the list.
Short input help: If known, select one value from the list.

short.value: Information about masking of intervention(s) assignment

definition.value: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

short.value: Is it an interventional or non-interventional study?

definition.value: Non-interventional study design refers to a study that does not aim to alter study outcomes of interest. Interventional study design refers to a study that aims to alter study outcomes of interest.

comment.value: Short input help: Select between non-interventional and interventional study design.

description.value: Value set defining codes for primary designs of studies in a ResearchStudy resource.

definition.value: The strategy for assigning interventions to participants.

comment.value: Short input help: Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, you can specify the study type in the field "Additional information about the study".

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify the type of an interventional study in a ResearchStudy resource.

definition.value: The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up.

comment.value: Select all that apply. If "Other" is selected, you can specify the study type in the field "Additional information about the study".

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify the type of a non interventional study in a ResearchStudy resource.
Value set defining codes to specify the time perspective of a study in a ResearchStudy resource.

short.value: Type of allocation of participants to an arm

definition.value: Type of allocation/assignment of individual study participants to an arm.

comment.value: Short input help: Select one value from the list.

description.value: Value set defining codes to specify the subject allocation in a study.

short.value: Primary health condition(s), disease(s) or focus of the study

definition.value: Group of items providing information about primary health condition(s) or disease(s) considered in the study, or the focus of the study (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

short.value: Code ---- If known, code of the health condition, disease or focus in the terminology/classification used

definition.value: Code of the health condition, disease, focus in the terminology/classification used.

comment.value: Short input help: If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

definition.value: Terminology/classification used for the health condition, diesease or focus.

comment.value: If used, name of the terminology/classification.

definition.value: Code of the health condition, disease, focus in the terminology/classification used.

comment.value: If found, the code from the terminology/classification used.

short.value: Name of the primary health condition, disease or focus of the study

definition.value: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the study, or the focus of the study (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

comment.value: The use of terms from established terminologies/classifications (e.g. SNOMED CT, ICD, etc.) is preferred. However, also self-assigned terms are allowed. | Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

short.value: Name of the primary health condition, disease or focus of the study

definition.value: Name of primary health condition or disease considered in the study, or the focus of the study (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

comment.value: Additional information: The use of terms from established terminologies/classifications (e.g. SNOMED CT, ICD, etc.) is preferred. However, also self-assigned terms are allowed. | Short input help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT (https://browser.ihtsdotools.org).

definition.value: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the resource.

comment.value: Additional information: Other web pages related to the resource can additionally be entered in the section "Related resources".

definition.value: Group of items providing information about keywords describing the resource.

comment.value: Additional information: The findability of the resource can be significantly increased if proper keywords are stated.

definition.value: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary.

comment.value: If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

definition.value: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary.

comment.value: Short input help: If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

definition.value: If known, the code of the keyword in a classification/vocabulary.

comment.value: Short input help: If found, the code from the classification/vocabulary used.

definition.value: Keyword(s) describing the resource.

comment.value: Additional information: The use of terms from established classifications/vocabularies (e.g. MeSH, UMLS, SNOMED CT) is preferred. However, also self-assigned keywords are allowed. | Short input help: Preferably, use terms from MeSH (https://meshb.nlm.nih.gov/search) or UMLS (https://uts.nlm.nih.gov/uts/umls/home).
Select all that apply.

short.value: Country(ies) where the study takes place

definition.value: Country or countries where the study takes place.

comment.value: Additional information: Select all that apply.

short.value: Regions and/or cities within a country where the study takes place

definition.value: If applicable, region(s) and/or city(ies) within a country where the study takes place.
A short plain text summary describing the resource in English.

comment.value: An English description is mandatory to facilitate the search. | The provided information should be understandable by scientific audience.

definition.value: Group of items with description(s) of the resource written not in English.

comment.value: Additional descriptions of the resource are optional. The provided information should be understandable by scientific audience.

definition.value: Language other than English of the description text.
Short plain text summary of the resource other than in English.

comment.value: Additional information: Additional descriptions of the resource are optional. The provided information should be understandable by scientific audience.

definition.value: Language of the description text.

comment.value: Additional information: English is a default value.

definition.value: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for study participants.

short.value: Start date of data collection for the study

definition.value: Start date of data collection for the study.

comment.value: Additional information: Preferred date format: DD.MM.YYYY. | Short input help: In case of a planned study, it is the intended start date; in case of an ongoing study — the actual start date.

short.value: End date of data collection for the study

definition.value: In case of studies with patients or other participants, it is the date when the last participant is examined or receives an intervention, or the date of the last participant’s last visit.

comment.value: Additional information: Preferred date format: DD.MM.YYYY. | Short input help: In case of a planned or ongoing study, it is the intended end date; in case of a completed study — the actual end date.

short.value: Reason why the study was stopped

definition.value: If the study was stopped prematurely, specification of the reason(s) why it was halted.

comment.value: Short input help: E.g., accrual goal met / closed due to toxicity / closed due to lack of study progress / temporarily-closed per study design /etc.
Short input help: Select one value from the list.

short.value: Reason why the study was stopped

definition.value: If the study was stopped prematurely, specification of the reason(s) why it was halted.

comment.value: Short input help: E.g., accrual goal met / closed due to toxicity / closed due to lack of study progress / temporarily-closed per study design /etc.

short.value: Any additional information about the study

definition.value: Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties.

comment.value: Short input help: Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties.

short.value: Any additional information about the study

definition.value: Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties.

comment.value: Short input help: Any additional information about specific aspects of the study that cannot be captured by other properties.

short.value: Arms or groups/cohorts of the study

definition.value: Group of items providing information about arms or groups/cohorts of the study.
Short name used to identify the arm/group.

comment.value: Additional information : For interventional studies: "Arm" means a pre-specified group or subgroup of participant(s) in a clinical trial assigned to receive specific intervention(s) (or no intervention) according to a protocol. For non-interventional studies: "Group" means a predefined group (cohort) of participants to be studied.

definition.value: Role of the given arm in the study.

comment.value: Short input help : Select one value from the list.

description.value: Codes for the main intent of the study.

definition.value: Additional descriptive information about the given arm/group.

comment.value: Additional information : For interventional studies: If needed, additional descriptive information (including which interventions are administered in each arm) to differentiate each arm from other arms in the clinical trial. For non-interventional studies: Explanation of the nature of the study group (for example, those with a condition and those without a condition; those with an exposure and those without an exposure).

short.value: Research questions and/or hypothesis underlying the study

definition.value: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the study.
